title: League of legends isn't opening.
body: After I couldn't open LoL, I tried uninstalling and then reinstalling the game. However, I cannot even reach patching because as soon as I click the icon, the LoL logo comes on the screen, then it goes and nothing else happens. There are some instances of LoL related things on the task manager, however these don't seem to be doing anything and the game still isn't opening.

replies.body: Friend is having the same issue.

If those LoL instances are still open in task manager even when nothing comes up, go ahead and shut those down to make sure those leftover processes aren't preventing League from opening a new instance. 

If you're still having issues after that, your pc may not have the right permissions in place to let League run the way it's supposed to. Go through the steps in [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those permissions set up and you should be back on the Rift in no time!
